Text: Dude....i seriously admire the work u do..and i download most of ur torrents..but 1 thing that pisses me off and has forced me to write this fucking paragraph comment... is that u use imageshack for screens and all.. :-| ...its screens are blocked and we need to copy it so as to see it...why dont u simply use bayimg or some other site whose links are not blocked ??? :-?
bayimg always shows "database overloaded" message...I will try on other sites..
